title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 635 - General Quality Control and Administrative Requirements Applicable to Programs, services or Facilities Funded or Certified by the Office for People With Developmental Disabilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 635 - General Quality Control and Administrative Requirements Applicable to Programs, services or Facilities Funded or Certified by the Office for People With Developmental Disabilities

State Regulations

Subpart 635-1 - Background (§ 635-1.1 to 635-1.3)

Subpart 635-4 - Financial Reporting and Audit Requirements (§ 635-4.1 to 635-4.6)

Subpart 635-5 - Reimbursement of Medicaid Service Coordination (Repealed)

Subpart 635-6 - Allowability of Capital Costs and Costs of Transactions with Related Parties (§ 635-6.1 to 635-6.7)

Subpart 635-7 - Environmental Requirements (§ 635-7.1 to 635-7.5)

Subpart 635-8 - [Repealed]
Subpart 635-9 - Provision of Required Supplies and services (§ 635-9.1 to 635-9.2)

Subpart 635-10 - Provision of Home and Community-Based Waiver Services (§ 635-10.1 to 635-10.5)

Subpart 635-11 - Enrollment in Medicare Prescription Drug Plans and Fully Integrated Duals Advantage Plans for Individuals with Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities (FIDA-IDD) (§ 635-11.1 to 635-11.10)

Subpart 635-12 - Liability for Services (§ 635-12.1 to 635-12.12)

Subpart 635-13 - Independent Practitioner Services for Individuals With Developmental Disabilities (§ 635-13.1 to 635-13.4)

Subpart 635-16 - Crisis Services for Individuals With Intellectual And/or Developmental Disabilities (CSIDD) (§ 635-16.1 to 635-16.7)

Subpart 635-99 - Glossary (§ 635-99.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 635

Amended

New

York State Register October 28, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 43, eff. 11/1/2015

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§ 1.03[22], 13.01, 13.07, 13.09, 13.15[a], 16.00, 16.17, 16.33, 16.50, 41.25, 41.36, 43.01, 43.02, 43.03, 1623; Executive Law, § 845-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
